ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

cookingTips: Squeeze spinach very dry to prevent wet, falling-apart burgers
Handle turkey gently when mixing to keep burgers tender, not dense
Cook to an internal temperature of 165°F to ensure food safety
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me on how to properly drain spinach and avoid overworking the turkey mixture.
